fields.description:
Description:
While testing Kitchen sink, I encountered a difference in searchbar layout and behavior compare to iOS6. 

Steps to reproduce:
# Install KS 
# Launch KS > Base UI > Views > Table Views > Headers with Filter. Index causes unexpected layout.
# Perform search and see the difference in layout (screenshot "after search.png").
fields.summary: iOS7: Table View - Headers with Filter - index causes unexpected layout issue
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201308302458
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3.v20130902103448
KS[3_1_X]
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/tree/3_1_X
CLI: 3.1.2
Alloy: 1.2.1
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS7(11A4449d)
iPhone4 iOS7(11A4449d)

comments.body: With the index being chopped off, the SearchView is added to the TableView so this may not be able to be fixed. With the SearchView resizing, that is still being looked at.

This issue is not constrained to use of a search bar and has not been resolved.

Using the example above, delete the search bar and add a background colour to the table view.

On iOS7, the index will display with a white background colour, as it does in the third screenshot above.

It looks pretty horrendous, and it means that you can't use an index if you have a custom table view.
The issue marked as a duplicate has been verified as still fixed. This issue is not. Comments to follow. Reopening and unlinking duplicate. For future reference duplicate was TIMOB-15281.

The issue is still present.
Tested with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.3.201403250634
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.3.v20140324164913
KitchenSink version 3.2.2
<guid>75c46c6a-35a6-4fad-bf29-3b3f28341c78</guid>
Node.JS Version: v0.10.13
NPM Version: 1.3.2

├── npm@1.3.2
├── titanium@3.2.1
└── titanium-code-processor@1.1.0
Device: iPhone 5C iOS version 7.1(11D)

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

Same issue here. With the index filter the searchBar is cut on it's right edge by the filter. Please do fix that.
SDK 5.2.0 GA
iOS 9
Closing ticket as invalid this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
